# Analysis Folders

Project outputs are kept in three folders in the shared ISWEL project folder [pdrive\\is-wel\\indus\\analysis](https://portal.iiasa.ac.at/dana/fb/smb/wfb.cgi?t=p&v=resource_1304000562.324190.2&si=0&ri=0&pi=0&sb=name&so=asc&dir=is-wel%5Cindus\analysis)

<ul>
<li> key_outputs – Contains key figures chosen from all the outputs.</li> 
<li> all-outputs – Contains all data output from the ISWEL MESSAGEix Indus model.</li>
<li> output_code – Contains code used to process outputs.</li>
</ul>
